summary: Simply adds a playable Greybeard Robe into the game.
descriptionHtml:
ALSO TAKE A LOOK AT MY \"Goblin Race Mod\" !
Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25644/

This mod adds a playable Greybeard Robe into the game that contains:

Greybeard Hood
Greybeard Tunic
Greybeard Boots

You can find them somewhere in High Hrothgar, and you can suit them on.

Installation:

Just put the GreyBeardSuit.esp into your Data directory.

This is my first ever made mod and I hope you all like it. (:
author: Django Rossa
